newsitem.title: UK: Abbey National off, HSBC Capel downgrades.
newsitem.headline: Abbey National off, HSBC Capel downgrades.

text.p: Shares in banking group Abbey National fell on Monday as analysts at HSBC James Capel cut their rating on the stock to "hold" from "buy", dealers said.
The shares were off 6p at 882p by 0835 GMT in a mostly weaker sector.
Market sources said the brokerage had downgraded the stock ahead of the bank's interim results on expected poor net lending, pressure on spreads and poor liquid savings.
Although the stock still looked cheap relative to Alliance & Leicester and Woolwich it has already risen nine percent this quarter and the analysts were becoming less enthusiastic, sources said.
